name: Eden River HD: A Virtual Reality Relaxation Experience - Early Access
name_original: Eden River HD: A Virtual Reality Relaxation Experience - Early Access
description:
Eden River HD

Already in use in VR research labs and special ed classrooms around the world, Eden River has set a new course for virtual reality. In Eden River, players cruise above a calm river, flying with various animals along the way. The experience also includes Endless Mode, a randomly generated endless experience purely for relaxation. Many of the games and demos currently available for the Oculus Rift Virtual Reality headset are horror games or violent action games. Unello Design is the first studio to focus on experiences about awe and transcendence.

One of the all time best sellers on Itch.io!

Eden River HD features:

-DK2 positional tracking support

-4 different gameplay modes!

Adventure Mode – a linear story experience,

Endless Mode – a pure endless relaxation experience,

Classic Mode – an updated version of the original Eden River,

Classic Endless – a simpler endless experience

First Virtual Nature game for the Oculus Rift

More environments coming soon as DLC!

Original score by Aaron Lemke was nominated for the Proto Award for Best Score
